mean_cn: adj. 红外线的；  n. 红外线
mean_en: having or using electromagnetic waves which are longer than those of red light in the spectrum, and which cannot be seen
sentence: The thief tried to sneak through the infrared security system.
sentence_trans: 小偷试图溜过红外线安防系统。
word_etyma: infra下，低 + red红线 → 红外线或低于红线
